params.taskDescription:
Convert <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>25</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mn>6</mn>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{25}}{6}</annotation></semantics></math> to a mixed number.

      <mn>30</mn>

  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">15\frac{7}{{30}}</annotation></semantics></math> to an improper fraction.
